title: Washington Post Condemns Conviction of Iran Reporter
text:
Published By: Wall Street Journal - Today 
Newspaper’s executive editor Martin Baron calls Iranian court’s verdict on imprisoned reporter Jason Rezaian an ‘outrageous injustice�...
